commandDescription: Search picklist fields inside project and create a static resource file with picklist fields, used to solve the picklist upgrade issue in dx unlock package https://trailblazer.salesforce.com/issues_view?id=a1p3A0000003Uk2QAE
packageFlagDescription: Name of the package to generate the picklist patch
loglevel: [default: info] logging level for this command invocation
